name: Overgrown (faerae)
description:
Take care of the crops until the time runs out, by watering them when they wilt with water from the well, and by removing pesky weeds. Promptly, if possible, or the weeds may get a bit... out of control.

(press 1 for watering can, press 2 for trowel to remove weeds. I was going to try to convey that properly, and then the sun came up and the fire of my all-nighter left me)

(consider this a general apology for the awkward silence, janky play, lack of polish, etc.)
